name: Venture Valley Business Tycoon
description:
Get Down to Business! Are you a born business tycoon, a natural entrepreneur, and a leader? Impress your friends and competitors with your business strategy skills in a new multiplayer esports game.



Play with friends in PVP mode, compete in strategic duels, learn real business skills and build a business empire. Because Knowledge is Power! This business-building game lets players learn to be entrepreneurs and pit their business savvy against one another. Players learn real skills as they become the boss, build up businesses and fight off competition in this tycoon sim game.



Sharpen your skills by taking over Venture Valley Tycoon! Start off your humble business dreams in Fortune Springs, and continue to expand your business empire. Turn your small business into an enterprise and move on up to bigger and tougher cities. See if you can hang with the business elites in Mapleburgs, Brickyard, and the elusive Palms. Be your own boss and compete with other plays in PVP mode.



Have fun creating custom game Avatars with millions of wacky combinations. Pick unique upgradable HQ's that you can bring into PVP and single-player matches. Use game boosts and adversity cards to edge out the competition while also adding a bit of flair with electrifying animations.



Stay tuned for new multiplayer, PVP esports games where you can compete in special game modes to be the best entrepreneur.



Manage your business portfolio, be your own boss, start your own business, and establish yourself as the greatest tycoon Venture Valley has ever seen!
publishers: Singleton Foundation for Financial Literacy & Entrepreneurship
